headline: CHTR Expands Availability of Spectrum TV App: Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: Charter Communications expands the Spectrum TV App to LG and VIZIO TVs, fueling app growth and mobile gains, which presents a compelling entry point in the stock.

headline: Pick 5 Buyer-Focused Stocks as Consumer Confidence Rebounds in May
summary: Consumer confidence rebounds in May. Zacks highlights DIS, NFLX, CHTR, ROKU and RBLX as top buy picks in the consumer discretionary space.

raw.headline: Pick 5 Buyer-Focused Stocks as Consumer Confidence Rebounds in May

headline: 3 Value Stocks Facing Headwinds
summary: The low valuation multiples for value stocks provide a margin of safety that growth stocks rarely offer. However, the challenge lies in determining whether these cheap assets are genuinely undervalued or simply on sale due to their potentially deteriorating business models.

raw.headline: 3 Value Stocks Facing Headwinds
